Title: Viral Genome Sequencing Proves Nosocomial Transmission of Fatal Varicella
Abstract: © The Author 2016. Published by Oxford University Press for the Infectious Diseases Society of America. All rights reserved.We report the first use of whole viral genome sequencing to identify nosocomial transmission of varicella-zoster virus with fatal outcome. The index case patient, nursed in source isolation, developed disseminated zoster with rash present for 1 day before being transferred to the intensive care unit (ICU). Two patients who had received renal transplants while inpatients in an adjacent ward developed chickenpox and 1 died; neither patient had direct contact with the index patient.
